patthana22.14:1.1: Nakusalaṁ naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Apariyāpannasadisaṁ. Cha pañhā.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.14:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:2.1_1: Naakusalaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:2.1_2: Naabyākataṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.14:2.1_3: Nakusalaṁ naaniyatañca naabyākataṁ naaniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyato
patthana22.14:2.1_4: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ naaniyatañca naabyākataṁ naaniyatañca dhammaṁ
patthana22.14:2.1_5: paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
